page.title: 17INDUSTRY 2 LANGRISH AREA
page.content: Parkwood Arts Light Industry is run as a joint business. It was started 22 years ago in Sussex and has been based outside Langrish for the past seven years where the rates are cheaper and there are larger premises. Some 20 people are employed at the factory built in a disused farm. They come to work from as far as Havant, Midhurst and Sutton Scotney. The company makes wooden boxes which are fitted with wooden slot racks for holding highly accurate metal gauge blocks.The raw materials are wood imported from Brazil, Rumania, Africa and the Far East. Beech plywood is also used. The finished boxes are sold in the United Kingdom and overseas, for an average price of Â£25. The company is growing steadily and produces 4000 boxes a month. ,
